top_comments.comment: i'm so glad you guys included kapustin in there. he's one of my favorite composers just from the groove he has

comments_since_last_sample.body: lol the intro to this vid kinda sounded like a ms. mojo top ten video intro

Ok, so I have the tenth song that you forgot to put on your top 10 list - Stravinsky's 'Apollon Musagete'. Loved the post, love the site, you guys are the greatest. Please do another like this, lists of great pieces that aren't part of the standard rep.
